name: Roomzzz Aparthotel Leeds City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011
reviews.text: My wife & I had a two night stay here and was very happy with our stay. Warm welcome, great room/facilities and service from members of staff. Had an issue with our shower, notified front desk and popped out for 3 hrs or so. Arrived back to be told it was fixed. Very swift work. Good location, easily within walking distance of the centre and various attractions....and importantly the train station. Have recommended and will continue to do so. Will stay again, without hesitation.
reviews.title: Recommend!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011
reviews.text: We had a fantastic stay here, I have recommended you to all my friends, as many like to visit Leeds for the weekend:-)
reviews.title: Very very impressive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cannot fault a thing, exceptional value, well situated, clean, all mod cons, including dishwasher and iPod docking station. Realy enjoyed our weekend and will definately be back:-)
reviews.title: Excellent budget hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: xxxxx well worth the 5 stars
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Stayed for two nights over the Easter weekend and I was very impressed with this hotel. The location is great for the centre of Leeds and the reduced NCP parking is a real bonus! The staff were friendly and very helpful.
reviews.title: Great. Would absolutely stay here again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great base to explore Leeds City centre and waterfront. Well appointed and stylish without wasting money on needless luxuries. Well organised and efficient staff and a no hassle check in, a big room with fitted kitchen, and all services - dishwasher, wash machine etc - for less than the price of a double hotel room with none of these. Had free access to the internet and loved the grab and go breakfast. Parking was nearby but still not cheap - in the NCP carpark - 6 quid for 24 hours - you get a discouted voucher from the Roomzz staff. But a minute over and it becomes 12 quid - as we found out!
reviews.title: Great concept - really good value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the liberty suite for my birthday.. rooms were very clean! very roomy, the living room is separate to the bedroom which was great!
reviews.title: Excellent Stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Living room had it's own IMAC Desktop! with free internet which was great!
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kitchen side had everything you needed
reviews.title: clean, quiet and nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Flatscreen telly with freeview! even though sky sports didn't work.
reviews.title: LIKEABLE LEEDS

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: Stayed for 1 night in a studio apartment on the 3rd floor. Check-in was very quick and efficient
reviews.title: Hard to find any faults

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Room was spotless and very well furnished Bed was large and comfortable. All fittings and equipment very good quality
reviews.title: Excellent Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Free wi-fi worked well. iPod dock/alarm clock,AppleMac and good air-con all add to the experience
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The heated bathroom mirror was a nice touch
reviews.title: Excellent Staff and Very Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only worry was the group of lads checking in on a stag night and the gang of girls in the room next to us with music blaring as we got to our door. I can honestly say that the minute we closed our door we heard nothing else. The sound proofing must be good!
reviews.title: Nice small hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We arrived at 14:30 at Roomzzz, the receptionist asked if we would like to check in (not sure if she remembers me from many previous stays). She checked the room and we were able to check in.
reviews.title: great staff, great location - overall, great!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The room was a top floor smart studio with a balcony. The room was clean and spacious, we stayed on the Friday which was very hot so having a balcony was a bonus.
reviews.title: roomz at leeds perfect for a short break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: With a Kitchen, TV and a Mac Mini, these apartments have everything you need, oh if you have an iPhone then no need to bring a charger as the apartments have iHome which can charge your phone.
reviews.title: Almost perfect...just a couple of blips!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would recommend Roomzzz to family and friends.
reviews.title: lovely room, with an amazing shower!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: booked roomzz after reading the reviews, and having stayed at a similar style hotel in france before. however found this hotel to be perfect. it was easy to find, not far from the motorway networks, so easy to leave on the last day. ncp car park minutes away with a good discount. a couple of small shops close by to buy milk, a paper etc. the room was very clean and comfortable, expcailly the beds which is so important. the kitchen took me by surprise i really did not expect a full size fridgeand freezer, my ice cream looked a little lost in it. there was a full size washing machine, also a hob, microwave and dishwasher, in fact a whole kitchen. the shower was very powerful. in the lobby there was a free drinks machine and in the mornings freee fruit and croissants. also a mac / tv with full internet access. this is very good location easy walk into the shop,the bars and the armouries. would i stay there again - yes i would
reviews.title: superb service, great location, pretty good value.

aka: Roomzzz Aparthotel Leeds City Hotel Leeds
description: Contemporary 36 bed apart-hotel in the heart of Leeds. All rooms are fully air-conditioned and the most amazingly comfortable memory foam beds. Every room is fitted with an Apple Mac computer, complemented with free broadband and Wi-Fi. You will also find a modern fitted kitchen with a dishwasher and all necessary utensils. A free grab & go service with fresh pastries and coffee and fruits is served each morning.
